attributes.title: Wowww really? Really?
attributes.review: I just downloaded this app and immediately I was kicked out of my phone! 🤯🤬😡😡 My phone started spazzing and reciting some weird ritual crap!!! I CANNOT believe that I got kicked out of my OWN phone! 😤 If I could give this a one star, I wouldn’t. I’d just give it a rock because doesn’t deserve a star! 😤😤 TERRIBLE TERRIBLE TERRIBLE! 🙅🏻‍♀️🙅🏻‍♀️🙅🏻‍♀️

attributes.review: The app freezes and information is late and not up to date

attributes.title: PROMOTING DIVORCE
attributes.review: This app consistently promotes Melania Trump, who is not the President’s first wife!!! To all my fellow Trump supporters, do not support this divorcee and adulterer. That is NOT very Christian!

attributes.title: I DIED because of this
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app and the second I opened this bugs and snakes and a hippo came to my door 😡 like really Cheeto? You made this happen so you have to pay for my funeral service at 10:30 on a Wednesday 😭 my family misses me so much you better pay them to get me taxidermist 😩 i also got my pp cut off no body liked me bc of this app 😓😥😱😰😭😩😩😩😩😩😩😖😖

attributes.title: Hell nah
attributes.review: They wanted my phone number right off the bat and I don’t know about you but I’m underage and if trump wants my number, what do you think he wants from me🥺. I’m highly scared. Secondly my phone started screaming “white power” only 20 second of being within the app. My fingers started leaving trails of orange dust on everything I touched. 0/10 would not recommend 👎
